name: Ahmed Omran
courses: The Ultimate React Course 2024: React, Next.js, Redux & More (Udemy)
The Complete JavaScript Course 2024: From Zero to Expert! (Udemy)
bio: What started as a love for design has turned into a passion for building interactive digital experiences.
story: I was born and raised in a small town in Egypt, and curiosity was my first guide to the world of web development. I knew little, just glimpses, but that curiosity was enough to open a wide door for me that I hadn't anticipated. When I started college in 2019, I had no clear vision for my career path. I thought I'd head toward marketing and advertising, but I found myself returning to web development, as if it was the path I'd been searching for all along.

At first, programming fascinated me. But what truly captivated me was the creative aspect—the colors, the movement, and the fun challenge of building something that combines beauty and function. From there, I naturally transitioned to the world of design, and since then, I haven't looked back.

Once technology and design met in my world, my true journey began. Every question opened three more, and every line of code revealed new possibilities. The road wasn't easy; some opportunities didn't pan out, but I didn't see failure—I saw a space to create my own path. I spent long hours learning, experimenting, making mistakes, and learning again. Guidance, constant curiosity, and a determination to develop myself helped me reach where I am today.

I now specialize in designing and developing responsive, user-friendly, and visually appealing web interfaces. I believe that the best digital experiences arise when beauty meets logic, and I'm here to make that encounter feel like magic.

beliefs.beyond coding: I believe that great work doesn’t come from pressure alone—it comes from passion, curiosity, and the willingness to keep learning, even when it’s uncomfortable. That balance between focus and fun? That’s where the magic happens.
beliefs.content: Outside of work, you’ll usually find me recharging—sometimes by taking a quick nap, playing video games, kicking around a football, or simply diving into the latest design trends for inspiration. I enjoy experimenting with creative ideas, whether or not they ever make it into a final project. It keeps my mind fresh and my creativity alive.

projects.title: Gallery
projects.bio: A digital home where creativity flows freely and every brushstroke finds its admirer. Platform connecting artists with art lovers. Discover the art that moves passionate hearts.
projects.description: A beautiful and immersive art gallery platform built with React, TypeScript, and GSAP animations. The platform serves as a digital home for artists to showcase their work and for art enthusiasts to discover pieces that resonate with them. Featuring smooth animations, responsive design, and an elegant user interface that puts the artwork front and center.
features: Stunning gallery layout with grid and masonry views
Smooth scroll animations powered by GSAP
Browse artwork by categories and styles
Detailed artwork view with artist information
Responsive design for optimal viewing on all devices
Fast loading and optimized image delivery

projects.title: Todo List
projects.bio: A simple task management application for productivity. Clean and intuitive interface for managing daily tasks with ease.
projects.description: A simple task management application built with React, TypeScript, Vite, and Tailwind CSS. The app provides a clean and intuitive interface for managing daily tasks, with a focus on simplicity and ease of use. Built with modern web technologies to ensure fast performance and type safety.
features: Add, edit, and delete tasks efficiently

projects.title: Bsaraha
projects.bio: An anonymous messaging platform for honest feedback. A safe and engaging way to receive messages without revealing sender identity.
projects.description: Bsaraha is a web application that allows users to receive anonymous messages from their friends. It provides a safe and engaging way for users to get honest feedback and share thoughts without revealing the sender's identity. Built with modern animations and smooth interactions to enhance user experience.
features: Unique user profile links for sharing

projects.title: Crusto
projects.bio: A modern pizza restaurant website with enhanced mobile experience. Clean design and expressive visual hierarchy for easy navigation.
projects.description: Crusto Pizza is an upgraded version of the original Crusto site with an emphasis on mobile usability, cleaner design, and more expressive visual hierarchy. The layout is simplified with clear sections and modern spacing, making it more accessible on smaller devices while keeping the branding intact.
features: Enhanced visual hierarchy for better UX

projects.title: MoveOn
projects.bio: A visually striking fitness website promoting healthy lifestyle. Bold typography and vibrant colors reflect energy and action.
projects.description: MoveOn is a visually striking fitness website designed to promote a healthy lifestyle and gym membership programs. It uses powerful imagery, bold typography, and bright colors to reflect energy and action. Each section focuses on benefits, testimonials, and motivational content.
features: Bold typography and vibrant color scheme

projects.title: Banki
projects.bio: A clean and professional landing page for financial platform. Calm color palette and minimalist layout convey security and trust.
projects.description: Banki is a clean and professional landing page tailored for a fictional bank or financial platform. It uses a calm, trustworthy color palette and minimalist layout to convey financial security and user trust. The sections are crafted to guide the user through service highlights, benefits, and key offerings.
features: Clean grid-based layout for easy scanning
Sticky navigation bar for quick access
Hero section with key messaging and CTA
